A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For me the standouts in this series are ANH (the original ground-breaker that still works as a stand alone movie) TPM (totally unexpected\, novelistically thick\, fantastic visuals) RoTS (a great tragedy -- SW style) and RO (more mature in tone\, stylistically different\, excellent characters) and now TLJ (ambitious\, off-beat\, emotional -- broke SW so SW could grow beyond copying GL forever).
